_header: So sit fairhead in woman sooth

CULGg432.Transcription:
Svo sit fairhed in womman sotsuo þe geldene begli in suynes
                    wrotbituene hope and dredeSchal man his lif right lede
CULGg432.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.160.
